baseline, the technique should be ﬁxed or abandoned. The technique used to generate a forecast
to calculate the baseline performance must be easy to implement and naive of problem-speciﬁc
details. The goal is to get a baseline performance on your time series forecast problem as quickly
as possible so that you can get to work better understanding the dataset and developing more
